name: Potato Salad Man
description:
Play as the great inventor of the Mass Rearranger, and make some potato salad. Easy right?

Made for the Potato Salad Game Jam

Controls:

- A/D to walk left/right

- Space to Jump

- E to Interact

- Shift/Control to Transform

(Shift reforms you where you deformed, Control reforms you at your new location)

Xbox Controller Controls(Windows):

- Left Analog to walk left/right

- A to Jump

- X to Interact

- B/Y to Transform

(B reforms you where you deformed, Y reforms you at your new location)

(Dpad to complete sliding puzzle)
